attributes.action: Conduct an independent review of the Crown Prosecution Service
attributes.additional_details:
It has been a long held belief of the public and law enforcement, that the CPS is not fit for purpose. All it manages to do is be a barrier between the victims, and the justice they deserve.

We the undersigned hereby request an independent review into the CPS. The end result, we hope, will be a more useful organisation, for the cost cutting times in which we live.
